title: Batching Requests
description: Gmail API guide on batching multiple API calls into a single HTTP request for improved performance

limits_documented.note: Batches count as n requests toward quotas, not 1

important_semantics: Server may execute batch calls in any order (non-deterministic)
Batch calls count as separate requests for quota purposes
All inner requests must go to same Google API
Full URLs not allowed in batch requests, only paths
Larger batches (>50) likely to trigger rate limiting
